summary: Adds a new High elf follower to the game
descriptionHtml:
Ladies and gentlemen, i present you Arial The White Bitch... huh, i mean Witch :3
Arial is an High elf follower with ice magic that levels with the player from lvl 1 to 81, if you want her to level up more just use the console commands.
Also, she may run out of mana at low level and start attacking with her bare hands (and she hurts, my character tried x_x) so maybe you should giver her a weapon just in case.
And you're gonna need the following mods:
ApachiiSkyHairFemale_v_1_4 (Required)
http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/10168/?
Also to look like the pictures you need:
Elven Ethereal overhaul
http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/24273/? (not required)
The eyes of beauty
http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/13722/? (not required)
The armor is from Tera armors:
http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/25846/?
Thanks for those amazing mods.



Name: Arial
Age: 23
Gender: Female
Race: High elf
Marriageable: yes
Class: Ice mage
Spells: almost all ice skills + ice breath shout
Location: The arcaneum at winterhold college

Backstory:
Ariel is a powerful witch that lived in the ice lands of skyrim, she was tied of being in her iceberg house staring at the skulls of her dead ex-boyfriends (yes she kills the guys that hurt her feelings), so she decided to go on a quest to find her one and true love (yeah sure e_e, let's not hope that is your character) arround skyrim.
author: Hirochu
